title: Surveys show coronavirus pandemic savaging global economy - Financial Post
description: HONG KONG — Evidence of the devastation wreaked on the global economy by the coronavirus pandemic mounted on Tuesday as activity surveys for March from Australia and Japan showed record falls…
content: HONG KONG — Evidence of the devastation wreaked on the global economy by the coronavirus pandemic mounted on Tuesday as activity surveys for March from Australia and Japan showed record falls, with surveys in Europe and the United States expected to be just a… [+5158 chars]
